name: .VWR File Extension
summary: Learn about .VWR files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A VWR file is a document created by Velconoe Write, a word processor still under development and not yet released. It contains formatted text and may also include other document elements, such as images and tables. VWR files are renamed .ZIP files.

content: The VWR format is a Zip-compressed package consisting of separate files and folders. The file typically stores information in the following files and folder:

instructions: You can open a VWR file with Velconoe Write. However, Velconoe has not yet released the Write application.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
